info.title: Anomaly Detector Client
info.description: Root cause analysis(RCA) helps trace the crucial dimension combinations that contribute to the given anomaly point with aggregated dimension combination. For example, when a point with dimension Country = Sum, version = Sum is detected as anomaly point, using root cause analysis algorithm, we can locate the child dimension combination, for example, it might be Country = CN, version = IOS causes the given anomaly. Our algorithm supports finding root cause  from both single and multiple measures.

put.summary: Create a root cause analysis data set

parameters.name: dataSetId
parameters.description: The root cause analysis data set unique id, should be a string of uuid.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: create a root cause analysis data set request

Location.description: Location of the newly created resource.

default.description: Client error or server error (4xx or 5xx)

get.summary: List root cause analysis data sets

parameters.description: For paging, skipped number
